name: NEKOPARA Extra
description: About half a year before the opening of the patisserie, La Soleil where the catgirls work with Kashou. Back when Chocola and Vanilla were still kittens when they first arrived at the Minaduki household and before they opened up to the other catgirls.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: HD 720p 1280x720 Pixel VRAM 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0c
